content:
Service Cloud
What’s Service?
Set Up Service Cloud Basics
Contract line items are products covered by a service contract, not by a general contract. You can only use contract line items if you use products in Salesforce.

Available in both: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience
Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with the Service Cloud

A service contract’s line items are listed in the Contract Line Items related list.
Community users can access Contract Line Items wherever they access Service Contract. Schedules aren’t available for contract line items.

You can create a service contract that covers products X, Y, and Z, and then create entitlements on the service contract that are assigned to contacts on an account.

Contract line items have the following fields: 
- Contract
- Contract Name
- Line Item ID
- Product 
- Quantity
title: Service Cloud Contract Line Items Setup
